Package reservation

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
reservation.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a reservation record in a Hotel Reservation and Payment System
Since:
2022-04-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
Teresa Hung Kuo Chen

  • Field Details

    • reservStatus

      private Reservation.ReservStatus reservStatus
      The status of this reservation.

    • reservCode

      private String reservCode
      The corresponding reservation code for reference.

    • room

      private Room room
      The room object stores the assigned room for this reservation. If the reservation is in waitlist, room will be null.

    • rtype

      private Room.RoomType rtype
      The requested room type of this reservation.

    • setReservCode

      public void setReservCode(String s)
      Sets the reservation code. The reservation code consists of an uppercase letter and a random number from 1 to 999
      Parameters:
      s - The reservation code.

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt()
      Prints the acknowledgement receipt of this reservation. Information includes the guest and room details, date of check in and check out, number of adults and children and the status of this reservation.
